body.description: Product Description Tampax Pearl From the Manufacturer Stay covered with our best-ever leak protection. view largerGet incredible protection with Tampax Pearl Tampons. The LeakGuard Braid helps stop leaks before they happen to help you stay leak-free and worry-free for up to eight hours. The unique FormFit protection helps close the gaps that can cause leaks, while the CleanGuard layer adds an extra layer of protection around the tampon’s core.At a GlanceLeakGuard Braid helps stop leaks before they happenFormFit design gently expands to your unique shapeKey Features view largerLeakGuard BraidHelps stop leaks before they happen view largerAnti-Slip GripMakes applicator easy to hold and position view largerSmooth, Rounded TipFor comfortable insertion view largerPurse-Resistant WrapperDiscreet wrapper that won’t fall apart in your purseAlso Try view largerTry Tampax Pearl Liners for an everyday clean, on or off your period, and try Tampax Compak Pearl for pocket-size protection.Stay covered with our best-ever leak protection. Same great protection available from Tampax RadiantPut it in place easily, thanks to the Anti-Slip GripHelp stop leaks before they happen with the Anti-Gravity LeakGuard BraidInsertion is a breeze with the smooth, rounded tipProduct Comparison Tampax Radiant Tampax Compak Pearl Tampax Pearl Original Tampax Tampax Pearl Active Tampax Radiant tampons, our ultimate protection experience, have a resealable wrapper for our most discreet disposal. For discreet and portable protection, try Tampax Radiant Compak tampons. Tampax Compak Pearl gives you a full-size tampon in a small, extendable plastic applicator. Tampax Pearl offers incredible protection with a LeakGuard Braid to help stop leaks. Tampax cardboard has an absorbent core designed to fit your unique shape. Tampax Pearl Active Plastic offer high-performance protection that help outlast the toughest workouts. FormFit gently expands to every shape, while an Antigravity Backup Braid helps stop leaks. Lite ✓ ✓ ✓ Regular ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Super ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Super Plus ✓ ✓ ✓ Ultra ✓ Frequently Asked QuestionsHow does Tampax Pearl stop leaks?Tampax Pearl has built-in backup protection. It has a LeakGuard Braid to help stop leaks before they happen and expands widthwise to fit your unique form.How does Tampax Pearl feel different than other tampons?Like you expect with the name Pearl, this tampon has a smooth, plastic applicator and rounded tip for comfortable insertion. Plus, it has a contoured Anti-Slip Grip to make the applicator easy to hold and position.If I like Tampax Pearl, what other products would be right for me?Try Tampax Pearl Liners for an everyday clean, on or off your period, and try Tampax Compak Pearl for pocket-size protection.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Find your Flow Combo If your tampon leaks just after a few hours, try going up an absorbency size for better comfort and protection*. Simply go up from Light to Regular or from your current size up to the next higher absorbency. Only Tampax Pearl tampons have five absorbencies so you can find your flow combo. *Use the lowest absorbency that meets your needs Find your Flow Combo If your tampon is uncomfortable to remove, go down for a lighter absorbency*. Choose the right tampon absorbency throughout your period for better comfort and protection. Simply go down from Ultra to Super Plus or from your current size down to the next lightest absorbency. *Use the lowest absorbency that meets your needs

Outstanding Protection with Tampax Pearl LeakGuard Braid Tampax Pearl tampons feature a LeakGuard Braid that helps stop leaks by channeling them back into the core. Controlled Insertion The Anti-Slip Grip lets you hold the applicator securely, so you can insert the tampon with its rounded tip comfortably and easily. Smooth Removal Layer A smooth layer makes for easy tampon removal and outstanding comfort during your period. FormFit Protection FormFit design gently expands to fit your individual shape, so you can feel comfortable and confident during your period.

Frequently Asked Questions How does Tampax Pearl feel different than other tampons? Tampax Pearl Tampons have a special LeakGuard Braid to help stop leaks before they happen, while a Smooth Removal Layer allows for easy removal. Plus, FormFit Protection gently expands to fit your individual shape. How long can I wear a tampon? You can wear a tampon for up to eight hours, but never leave it in for longer than that. If you usually sleep longer, set an alarm or just use a pad instead. How do I know which absorbency to use? Choosing the right tampon absorbency can make a big difference to be comfortable and avoid leaks. Take the Tampax Quiz on Tampax's website to learn more. What makes Tampax Pearl different from Tampax Pocket Pearl? Both Tampax Pearl and Tampax Pocket Pearl offer outstanding protection with a LeakGuard Braid to help prevent leaks. The main difference is that Tampax Pocket Pearl is compact in size so it fits in your pocket. When ready to use, extend the compact applicator to make it a full-size one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great deal for the money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tampax, you da real MVP!
reviews.reviewText: I have a real problem with the fact that as a girl I need to find a solution to the monthly plague and that companies expect us to shell out an arm and a leg for said solution. I have tried many things but I keep coming back to Tampax pearl. They are the best tampons I have ever used and compared to most other sanity options, they are the easiest. I have tried other brands and they leak, which c'mon, periods are already annoying enough, now I have to worry about embarrassment? These are not cheap, which is super lame, but thankfully amazon has my back! Also, whats worse than going into the super market to buy my monthly tampons/ibuprofen and candy bar than to have the clerk make some sort of PMS joke. No thanks, not today a-hole!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars these I've found work better than most
reviews.reviewText: My go to tampon for years. I've tried so many. All tampons can leak, it's just part of wearing them if you have a heavy flow, these I've found work better than most. I still wear backup of course, but I just simply have less issues with these. The price is good since they get delivered, though I did find them cheaper at Costco for those with a membership. I have tried playtex sport and I still leaked. They do have the "360" version now that claims to have 3 layers that I haven't tried but you can't buy them in a big pack like this so they end up being more expensive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Reliable on the heavy days
reviews.reviewText: Such an easy way to get ahead of those surprise TOM days! My first few days are often very heavy, and having a few of these handy is the best way for me to stay prepared. If you're *very* heavy on days 1-2, like I am, you may want to opt for the Super Plus absorbent ones (I find myself changing out the Supers every 1-2 hours). But the Pearl line is by far my favorite. Keep in mind these are NOT as discrete as pocket-sized expandable tampons, but they are far more reliable!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars For Regular to Semi Heavy Flows
reviews.reviewText: These were perfect. I bought this big box hoping to not have to buy another for a long time and I ended up not having to buy any more for almost 2 years. They came in little plastic pouches so they were easy to hide in my purse or pocket. The plastic applicators were also easy to slide in. Sometimes it was hard to push the cotton in depending on your flow, but just wipe your hand off, try again. Overall, if you have a regular flow to a semi heavy flow, these will work fine. When they get too full you can feel them almost trying to come out so that means it's time to change. I'm semi heavy at first then I slow down to regular flow and I'd change mine 3 to 4 times a day. Also, I never had an issue with leaking at night while these were in.People make too much of a big deal of woman in their periods sometimes and menstruation is nothing to be ashamed about. I just wanted to put an honest review of the product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2022

reviews.reviewText: The best if you are using tampons

I'm on the tampons side and hate pads, so it was truly hellish experience when I had yo use pads in Japan (I couldn't find any tampons at all). So I'm happy that I bought this product and it seems that I can use them all year because of such huge amount, haha). Definitely recommend ❤️
